name: The Castle Of Diavolul - The Book Of Zolon
name_original: The Castle Of Diavolul - The Book Of Zolon
description: Years have passed since the attempt on resurrecting the Count had been foiled by the bravery of October Crow. Her name was praised and her heroic actions were. But one night a storm moved into the peaceful countryside and soon the air grew heavy with the foul stench of death. From out in the darkness came about the skeleton armies of the damned. Word got back to the village and soon a war for survival had begun. The armies of the dead swarmed the village and murdered everyone they could. Armed with her trusty sword and lantern Baroness October Crow now must return to the field of battle and stop just what evil has been unleashed.
